name: oak-frontend-base
description: oak框架中前端与业务逻辑无关的平台部分

scripts.copy-json: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.json lib/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.json es/
scripts.copy-js: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.js lib/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.js es/
scripts.copy-svg: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.svg lib/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.png lib/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.svg es/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.png es/
scripts.copy-less: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.less lib/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.wxss lib/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.css lib/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.less es/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.wxss es/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.css es/
scripts.copy-wxs: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.wxs lib/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.wxs es/
scripts.copy-xml: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.xml lib/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.xml es/
scripts.copy-wxml: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.wxml lib/ & copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.wxml es/
scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.es.json && npm run copy-js && npm run copy-less && npm run copy-wxs && npm run copy-svg && npm run copy-xml && npm run copy-wxml && npm run copy-json
scripts.prepare: rimraf node_modules/react & rimraf node_modules/react-dom & rimraf node_modules/react-router & rimraf node_modules/react-router-dom
scripts.remove-antd: rimraf node_modules/antd & rimraf node_modules/antd-mobile & rimraf node_modules/@ant-design & rimraf node_modules/antd-mobile-icons & rimraf node_modules/antd-mobile-v5-count
